entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I don't know how you manage to find time to do all these coronavirus taskforce press briefings. With all the demands needed from Twitter, golf, extortion, grifting. Not to mention all the hours you must surely spend in front of a mirror.

Astonishing really.
